name: Amsterdam
description: Amsterdam, the capital city of the Netherlands, is known for its artistic heritage, elaborate canal system, and narrow houses with gabled facades, legacies of the cityâ€™s 17th-century Golden Age. Its Museum District houses the Van Gogh Museum, works by Rembrandt and Vermeer at the Rijksmuseum, and modern art at the Stedelijk. Cycling is key to the city's character, and there are numerous bike paths.

foods.name: Stroopwafel
foods.description: Thin waffle cookies with caramel-like syrup filling.

foods.name: Bitterballen
foods.description: Deep-fried balls filled with ragout, typically served with mustard.

foods.name: Poffertjes
foods.description: Miniature fluffy pancakes, usually topped with powdered sugar and butter.

foods.name: Haring
foods.description: Raw herring typically served with onions and pickles.

foods.name: Patat
foods.description: Thick-cut fries served with a variety of sauces.

foods.name: Pancakes
foods.description: Dutch-style pancakes with various sweet or savory toppings.

restaurants.name: Restaurant Vinkeles
restaurants.description: Fine dining restaurant housed in a former bakery, offering French-inspired cuisine.

restaurants.name: De Kas
restaurants.description: Restaurant set in a greenhouse serving seasonal dishes with ingredients from its own garden.

restaurants.name: Bridges Dining
restaurants.description: Michelin-starred seafood restaurant overlooking Amsterdam's canals.

restaurants.name: Ciel Bleu
restaurants.description: Two-Michelin-starred restaurant offering French cuisine with panoramic city views.

restaurants.name: Restaurant Daalder
restaurants.description: Cosy restaurant serving creative French-inspired dishes with Dutch influences.

restaurants.name: Rijks
restaurants.description: Restaurant offering contemporary Dutch cuisine inside the Rijksmuseum.

hotels.name: W Amsterdam
hotels.description: Luxury hotel located in the city center, offering stylish accommodations and rooftop views.

hotels.name: Hotel Pulitzer Amsterdam
hotels.description: Historic hotel comprised of 25 restored canal houses, offering elegant rooms and a garden courtyard.

hotels.name: Conservatorium Hotel
hotels.description: Luxury hotel set in a former music conservatory, featuring contemporary design and a spa.

hotels.name: Hotel TwentySeven
hotels.description: Boutique hotel offering ultra-luxurious suites with personalized service in a central location.

hotels.name: The Dylan Amsterdam
hotels.description: Chic boutique hotel set in a 17th-century building along the Keizersgracht canal.

hotels.name: Hotel Okura Amsterdam
hotels.description: Five-star hotel offering luxurious accommodations and multiple dining options, including a Michelin-starred restaurant.

transportation.name: Amsterdam Metro
transportation.description: Rapid transit system serving parts of Amsterdam and its suburbs.

transportation.name: Amsterdam Trams
transportation.description: Tram network providing efficient transportation throughout Amsterdam.

transportation.name: Amsterdam Buses
transportation.description: Bus network covering the city and surrounding areas.
